SELECT CM.CPU_MANUFACTURER_IDX, CM.CPU_MANUFACTURER_NAME, CCN.CPU_CODE_NAME_IDX, CCN.CPU_CODE_NAME_NAME, CST.CPU_SOCKET_TYPE_IDX, CST.CPU_SOCKET_TYPE, CPT.CPU_PROCESS_TECHNOLOGY_IDX, CPT.CPU_PROCESS_TECHNOLOGY_NAME, CC.CPU_CORE_IDX, CC.CPU_CORE_COUNT, CT.CPU_THREAD_IDX, CT.CPU_THREAD_COUNT
FROM CPU_MANUFACTURER CM JOIN CPU_CODE_NAME CCN ON CM.COMPUTER_PART_FILTER_IDX = CCN.COMPUTER_PART_FILTER_IDX JOIN CPU_SOCKET_TYPE CST ON CCN.COMPUTER_PART_FILTER_IDX = CST.COMPUTER_PART_FILTER_IDX JOIN CPU_PROCESS_TECHNOLOGY CPT ON CST.COMPUTER_PART_FILTER_IDX = CPT.COMPUTER_PART_FILTER_IDX JOIN CPU_CORE CC ON CPT.COMPUTER_PART_FILTER_IDX = CC.COMPUTER_PART_FILTER_IDX JOIN CPU_THREAD CT ON CC.COMPUTER_PART_FILTER_IDX = CT.COMPUTER_PART_FILTER_IDX

SELECT CPU_IDX, CPU_NAME, (SELECT CM.CPU_MANUFACTURER_NAME FROM CPU_MANUFACTURER CM WHERE CM.CPU_MANUFACTURER_IDX = C.CPU_MANUFACTURER_IDX) AS CPU_MANUFACTURER_NAME, (SELECT CS.CPU_SERIES_NAME FROM CPU_SERIES CS WHERE CS.CPU_SERIES_IDX = C.CPU_SERIES_IDX) AS CPU_SERIES_NAME, (SELECT CT.CPU_TYPE_NAME FROM CPU_TYPE CT WHERE CT.CPU_TYPE_IDX = C.CPU_TYPE_IDX) AS CPU_TYPE_NAME, (SELECT CC.CPU_CORE_COUNT FROM CPU_CORE CC WHERE CC.CPU_CORE_IDX = C.CPU_CORE_IDX) AS CPU_CORE_COUNT, (SELECT CT.CPU_THREAD_COUNT FROM CPU_THREAD CT WHERE CT.CPU_THREAD_IDX = C.CPU_THREAD_IDX) AS CPU_THREAD_COUNT, (SELECT BC.CPU_BASE_CLOCK FROM CPU_BASE_CLOCK BC WHERE BC.CPU_BASE_CLOCK_IDX = C.CPU_BASE_CLOCK_IDX) AS CPU_BASE_CLOCK, (SELECT BO.CPU_BOOST_CLOCK FROM CPU_BOOST_CLOCK BO WHERE BO.CPU_BOOST_CLOCK_IDX = C.CPU_BOOST_CLOCK_IDX) AS CPU_BOOST_CLOCK, (SELECT T.CPU_TDP FROM CPU_TDP T WHERE T.CPU_TDP_IDX = C.CPU_TDP_IDX) AS CPU_TDP, (SELECT A.CPU_ARCHITECTURE_NAME FROM CPU_ARCHITECTURE A WHERE A.CPU_ARCHITECTURE_IDX = C.CPU_ARCHITECTURE_IDX) AS CPU_ARCHITECTURE_NAME, (SELECT PT.CPU_PROCESS_TECHNOLOGY_NAME FROM CPU_PROCESS_TECHNOLOGY PT WHERE PT.CPU_PROCESS_TECHNOLOGY_IDX = C.CPU_PROCESS_TECHNOLOGY_IDX) AS CPU_PROCESS_TECHNOLOGY_NAME, (SELECT CST.CPU_SOCKET_TYPE FROM CPU_SOCKET_TYPE CST WHERE CST.CPU_SOCKET_TYPE_IDX = C.CPU_SOCKET_TYPE_IDX) AS CPU_SOCKET_TYPE, (SELECT IG.CPU_INTEGRATED_GRAPHICS_NAME FROM CPU_INTEGRATED_GRAPHICS IG WHERE IG.CPU_INTEGRATED_GRAPHICS_IDX = C.CPU_INTEGRATED_GRAPHICS_IDX) AS CPU_INTEGRATED_GRAPHICS_NAME, (SELECT L2.CPU_L2_CACHE_SIZE FROM CPU_L2_CACHE L2 WHERE L2.CPU_L2_CACHE_IDX = C.CPU_L2_CACHE_IDX) AS CPU_L2_CACHE_SIZE, (SELECT L3.CPU_L3_CACHE_SIZE FROM CPU_L3_CACHE L3 WHERE L3.CPU_L3_CACHE_IDX = C.CPU_L3_CACHE_IDX) AS CPU_L3_CACHE_SIZE, CPU_RELEASE_DATE, CPU_ORIGIN_PRICE, CPU_NOW_PRICE, COMPUTER_PART_FILTER_IDX, (SELECT CPU_SFILE_NAME FROM CPU_IMAGE CI WHERE CI.CPU_IDX = C.CPU_IDX) AS CPU_SFILE_NAME FROM CPU C
